title: Odd issue with tab screen
body:
Accidentally launched it to the point of no return at the top of the screen. Couldn't move it at all.

This was pretty bad because it blocked the jungle timers and I couldn't see who had which dragons.

Does anybody know how to fix that?

replies.body: If I'm understanding correctly, the menu that pops up when you hit the *Tab* key consistently stayed up in your game? Did this happen in multiple games or just in one?
I couldn't do it in a quick custom game. I honestly have no idea what caused it in the first place.
Gotcha. Well if you can reproduce it, let me know so I can take a look.

Accidentally moved it to the tippy-top of the screen. Could only move champions positions within the menu.

It only happened in the one game so far, but I bet you it's easily replicable. I'll let you know about that in a few hours.
